Comment: The only way to get better at a game is to review your mistakes. I lost so I must have made some; Thus, I am annotating this game. Feel free to give any constructive criticism for a move you thought was bad or could have been done better. I'd appreciate it.
This was before I learned how to play the sicilian properly. I would have played c5 instead of b6.
Also developing, while attacking a pawn.
To end all thoughts of Bg5 or Ng5.
? I thought that pressing pawns where you castle is bad...am I wrong?
I planned on castling queen-side, so I moved the queen there.
Thinking back, I think this was a mistake. I thought I could press the pawns through... but couldn't.
